name: Proficiency Training: Remediation
effect: The player chooses a skill in which they are deficient. On a successful DT 10 skill check, they overcome the deficiency. Training slots are only expended if the check is successful, but gold is not refunded.

name: Proficiency Training: Apprenticeship
effect: The player chooses a skill in which they are not proficient. On a successful DT 12 skill check, they attain proficiency. Training slots are only expended if the check is successful, but gold is not refunded.

name: Proficiency Training: Expertise
effect: The player chooses a skill in which they are proficient. On a successful DT 16 skill check, their skill advances to expertise. Training slots are only expended if the check is successful, but gold is not refunded.

name: Proficiency Training: Mastery
effect: The player chooses a skill in which they are an expert. On a successful DT 20 skill check, their skill advances to mastery. Training slots are only expended if the check is successful, but gold is not refunded.

name: Mobility Training: Vertical Escape
effect: The player learns Vertical Escape, a technique for the grappling hook. If surroundings are appropriate, the player can throw the hook up to 30 feet vertically as an action. On a successful DT 12 parkour skill check, the grappling hook latches. The player can use an action to climb 10 feet up the rope, away from enemy melee attacks.

name: Mobility Training: Wall Run
effect: The player learns to run a short distance along or up walls, and to leap backwards off of them.
